descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This third segment in the third year (211) sequence continues to build on the foundation of the 111 and 121 sequences, and the first two quarters of 211. In addition to continued development of vocabulary and grammar knowledge, this course focuses on close reading of texts, register awareness, speaking fluency and listening comprehension, and grammatical accuracy in writing.

descriptions.name: Teaching Method
descriptions.value: Class is devoted to reading, written and oral discussion of texts, communication, translation and grammar explanation. Students are required to use audio-visual materials associated with the textbook series.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: Final grades for the course will be based on the following: (1) quizzes, (2) class attendance and participation, (3) assigned homework, including writing assignments, (4) midterm exam, and (5) final exam.
